sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Home Depot ( HD ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.3%.
Year to date, Home Depot has lost about 5.2% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Walt Disney ( DIS ), trading down 0.6%.
Walt Disney is showing a gain of 4.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Intel ( INTC ), trading down 0.5%, and Pfizer ( PFE ), trading up 1.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
